com.facebook.buck.rules

Interface TestRule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HasBuildTarget
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JavaTest, RobolectricTest, ShTest

    public interface TestRule
extends HasBuildTarget
    A BuildRule that is designed to run tests.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.facebook.buck.model.HasBuildTarget

        BUILD_TARGET_COMPARATOR, TO_TARGET

      • Methods inherited from interface com.facebook.buck.model.HasBuildTarget

        getBuildTarget

    • Method Detail

      • hasTestResultFiles

        boolean hasTestResultFiles(ExecutionContext executionContext)
        Returns a boolean indicating whether the files that contain the test results for this rule are present.

        If this method returns true, then interpretTestResults(ExecutionContext, boolean, boolean) should be able to be called directly.

      • runTests

        List<Step> runTests(BuildContext buildContext,
                  ExecutionContext executionContext,
                  boolean isDryRun,
                  TestSelectorList testSelectorList)
        Returns the commands required to run the tests.

        Note: This method may be run without BuildEngine.build(BuildContext, BuildRule) having been run. This happens if the user has built [and ran] the test previously and then re-runs it using the --debug flag.

        Parameters:
        buildContext - Because this method may be run without BuildEngine.build(BuildContext, BuildRule) having been run, this is supplied in case any non-cacheable build work needs to be done.
        isDryRun -
        executionContext - Provides context for creating Steps.
        testSelectorList - Provides a way of selecting which tests to include or exclude from a run.
        Returns:
        the commands required to run the tests

      • interpretTestResults

        Callable<TestResults> interpretTestResults(ExecutionContext executionContext,
                                         boolean isUsingTestSelectors,
                                         boolean isDryRun)

      • getLabels

        ImmutableSet<Label> getLabels()
        Returns:
        The set of labels for this build rule.

      • getContacts

        ImmutableSet<String> getContacts()
        Returns:
        The set of email addresses to act as contact points for this test.

      • getSourceUnderTest

        ImmutableSet<BuildRule> getSourceUnderTest()
        Returns:
        The set of BuildRule instances that this test is testing.

      • getPathToTestOutputDirectory

        Path getPathToTestOutputDirectory()
        Returns:
        The relative path to the output directory of the test rule.
